author: Gary J. Milne
releaseNotes: Initial Release of Tasmota Sync Drivers - Realtime & Native Synchronisation between Tasmota and Hubitat.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Switch with Sensor
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for switch with an attached sensor. Multiple sensor types and input types supported. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Color Bulb
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for color bulb, also supports CT mode. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Dimmer Switch
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for dimmer switch. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Dual Switch_Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for dual switch - dual plug. No energy monitoring. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Fan
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for fan with switch. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Switch_Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for switch_plug. Provides optional energy monitoring and supports current, voltage and power (watts). Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Sensor
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync Sensor driver. Multiple sensor types and input types supported. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater.
